p: In concordance with Mastrangelo et al ( 1), there was a high 30-day mortality of 54.4% (6/11) in our patient cohort. The four surviving patients (36.6%) were discharged; average total length of stay 58 days (range 31-78 days). One patient was stepped down after nine weeks in ICU but remained an inpatient until the end of our study period.
